description: The file defines the AppDbContext class, which is an Entity Framework Core DbContext for the Notes application. It configures the database schema, entity sets for User and Note, and relationships/indexes between them.

classes.name: AppDbContext
classes.description: EF Core DbContext for the Notes application, configuring entities, relationships, and database schema.

methods.name: AppDbContext
methods.description: Constructor accepting DbContextOptions to initialize the context.

methods.name: OnModelCreating
methods.description: Configures entity models, indexes, relationships, and the default database schema.
